document.full_text: a new york city third-grader and his father have been arrested after the boy sold a loaded 9mm pistol to a classmate for $3, police said on friday.
document.title: new york third grader charged with selling loaded gun
lines_and_colors: a new york city third-grader and his father have been arrested after the boy sold a loaded 9mm pistol to a classmate for $3, police said on friday.
